app_detail:
Let's become a ninja, master, hero, spy, or legend of slicing dancing fruit - the best of hyper- casual hit fruit-slicing mobile with-in fruit jump and dancing by the best EDM music!
- Go Ninja go... GO! Run... Attack... Shoot... Dance... Magic... Tiles... Hop...!

ğŸ‡ Touch screen to splat fruits.

ğŸŠ Roller fruit with colorful splash
ğŸ Difficult levels with immersive missions to complete. 
ğŸ Upgrade your gun, sword, knife, bullet and wrecking ball...
